arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS to this policy.

name.description: The name of the policy. If omitted, the provider will assign a random, unique name.

namePrefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

path.description:
Path in which to create the policy.
See [IAM Identifiers](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_Identifiers.html) for more information.

policy.description: The policy document. This is a JSON formatted string.

tags.description: Map of resource tags for the IAM Policy. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Policy resources.
